room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy" by Off The Couch Games in San Jose
room_description:
Delve into the mystery centered around some of the greatest conspiracies of our time, such as the new world order, the world economy, the moon landing, fluoridated water, lizard people... the list goes on! Link together their lies to uncover their truth.
With less than an hour to track down and expose the grisly details before mysterious agents arrive on scene, you must piece together clues and connect the dots to solve the biggest mystery of your lives. Sharpen your investigative skills, grab your tin foil hats, and find out if you can unravel the conspiracy!
